title: Chocolate beetroot cake
ingredients: ['250g well-drained, cooked beetroots, pureed', '1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract', '300g caster sugar', '250ml vegetable oil', '3 eggs', '225g plain flour', '1 1/2 teaspoons bicarbonate of soda', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '6 tablespoons unsweetened cocoa powder']
